mapper.select: select account_gender, account_birth_date, account_phoneNumber, account_num, account_interest, account_email, account_address, account_name, account_id from account where account_num = #{account_num}
mapper.update: update account set account_gender = #{account_gender}, account_birth_date = #{account_birth_date}, account_phoneNumber = #{account_phoneNumber}, account_interest = #{account_interest}, account_email = #{account_email}, account_address = #{account_address} where account_num = #{account_num}
mapper.select: select account_password from account where account_num = #{account_num}

select a.account_num, e.e_num, eh.eh_location, e.e_name, e.e_hitcount, e.e_price, e.e_startRecruiteDate, e.e_fname, l.like_status from account a JOIN liked l ON a.account_num = l.account_num JOIN event e ON l.e_num = e.e_num JOIN event_hall eh ON e.eh_num = eh.eh_num where l.LIKE_STATUS = '1' AND a.account_num = #{account_num}
mapper.update: update liked set like_status = '0' where account_num = #{account_num} AND e_num = #{e_num}
mapper.select: select a.account_num, a.account_name, a.account_phonenumber, a.account_email,a.account_id, e.e_applydate, e.e_name, e.e_startDate, e.e_endDate, e.e_num, eh.eh_location, tp.ticket_payment_price, tp.ticket_payment_status, tr.ticket__reservation_price, tr.ticket_reservation_amount, tr.ticket_reservation_num, tr.ticket_reservation_time, ticket_reservation_status from account a join ticket_reservation tr on a.account_num = tr.account_num join ticket_payment tp on tr.ticket_reservation_num = tp.ticket_reservation_num join event e on tr.e_num = e.e_num join event_hall eh on eh.eh_num = e.eh_num where account_num = #{account_num}
